attributes.action: Allow e-petitionees to enter personal details once yet apply them to many petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With so many e-petitions relevant to today's society it would be fairer to allow those that sign them to only have to enter their peronal details once yet apply them to the many petitions they wish to be noted on.  Otherwise many will be discouraged in letting their opinion be known and recognised.
